sentences.sContent: Whatever the trick, if the innocent victim falls for the joke the prankster yells, April Fool!
sentences.sContent_eng: Whatever the trick, if the innocent victim falls for the joke the prankster yells, April Fool!
sentences.sCn: 不管是什么样的招数，只要那个无辜的受害者中技了，恶作剧的人就会尖叫：“愚人!”

synos.tran: 爱开玩笑的人；顽皮的人；恶作剧的人

trans.tranCn: 爱开玩笑的人；顽皮的人；恶作剧的人
trans.tranOther: someone who plays tricks on people to make them look silly
